definitions.title: vb. denom.
definitions.body: dart greedily (like a bird of prey);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[וַיַּ֫עַט]] Qr (Kt:erron. [[ויעשׂ]]) 1Sa 14:32 and the people darted greedily upon the spoil ([[אֶל־הַשָּׁלָל]], so 2 ms. [[וַתַּ֫עַט]] 1Sa 15:19 (on forms v. Ges:§ 72 ff.).
